title: GTA3 SAVE GAME FIX
description:
This is a working fix for the release gta3-cd1.iso.torrent and gta3-cd2.iso.torrent avaible here at the pirate bay.

File: gta3.exe

Replace the gta3.exe in the game directory (something like c:/program files/rockstar games/gtaIII) with the file in this torrent.
Play and have fun. :-)

If it still doesn't work, try uninstalling the game and reinstalling it using Daemon Tools, avaible at http://www.daemon-tools.cc. Then replace the gta3.exe of the new installation with the file in this torrent.

This works on my computer. If it doesn't on yours, I cant help you... There is no point in asking me, 'cause i don't have a clue what more you can try doing.

Good luck. :-)
